title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: 354. » •' Ashburnham and Berklev received many advertisements from some officers with whom they had conversed, and who would have been glad that the King might have been restored by the army for the preferments which they expected might fall to their share, ' that Cromwell and Ireton resolved never to trust the King, or to do any thing towards his restoration,
